data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 8,315 believers in the state of Kauno.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kauno, Lithuania

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 8,315 believers in Kauno against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 70 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kauno, Lithuania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Kauno against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Azerbaijani people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Please, convict the 8,315 believers in Kauno, Lithuania to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Kauno, Lithuania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Kauno be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Kauno
location.people_groups_list: Estonian, Uzbek, Northern, Tatar, Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking, Kazakh
